items.sentence: I was careful not to say anything to make him angry.
I was caught in a shower on my way home from school.
I was planning to do my homework, but I fell asleep.
I was very angry with myself for my lack of courage.
I still think it\'s unlikely that he\'ll come today.
He practices playing the guitar until late at night.
He was disqualified from taking part in the contest.
How could you leave a four-year-old child all alone?
You can\'t believe everything you read in the paper.
You didn\'t tell me Tom was going to Boston with us.
